comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Augustus Peabody Gardner (November 5, 1865 – January 14, 1918) was a Representative from Massachusetts. Gardner was the son-in-law of Henry Cabot Lodge." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Augustus_Peabody_Gardner bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=G000050 Date on sticker could be 5/17/17 (reverse). On May 10, 1917 was an article of him in The Tomahawk, Page 5, (with photo) See also The Bismarck tribune., May 16, 1917, Image 1 : "CONGERSSMAN GARDNER TO ENTER ARMY" (with photo)

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information and links. We also have some photographs of him in our Harris & Ewing photograph collection: www.loc.gov/pictures/search/?q=augustus+gardner+rep&s.... We can add some information to this description when we next update.
